title: Start
body:
[["I have arrived. Time to change my grade, should be alright.  And hopefully not spend the rest of my life in prison."|normal1]] 
[[""I am outside.  Time for a grade change.""|arrogant1]]
[["I’m here.  I know I can get into the building. I know I can change the records. It’s doing it without a trace that worries me."|cautious1]]

title: normal1
body:
Secret Squirrel: "Follow everything that I say and prison shouldn’t be an issue. Just ensure that you worry about the computers and I’ll get you out of there"

[["I am a quick learner, getting the job done should be straightforward"|normal2]]
[["You doubt me?  I learn quickly, I told you I can get the job done."|arrogant2]]
[["I usually pick things up quickly. Never had this much pressure though."|cautious2]]

title: arrogant1
body:
Secret Squirrel: "Stay Focused.  Remember what you are about to do is illegal.  Are you sure you know what you are doing?"

[["I am a quick learner, getting the job done should be straightforward"|normal2]]
[["You doubt me?  I learn quickly, I told you I can get the job done."|arrogant2]]
[["I usually pick things up quickly. Never had this much pressure though."|cautious2]]

title: cautious1
body:
Secret Squirrel: "Do exactly as I say and that should not be a problem. You worry about the computers, and hiding your efforts. I’ll worry about the escape."

[["I am a quick learner, getting the job done should be straightforward"|normal2]]
[["You doubt me?  I learn quickly, I told you I can get the job done."|arrogant2]]
[["I usually pick things up quickly. Never had this much pressure though."|cautious2]]

title: normal2
body:
Secret Squirrel: "Whilst you may not have experience, there’s still a way to practice. Try getting into a vending machine without leaving proof. That should be on an isolated system. Take as many attempts as you need. While you’re at it.  Get yourself a drink."

[[Continue|cont2n]]

title: arrogant2
body:
Secret Squirrel: "Of course, you’re unproven. Prove to me you know what you’re doing.  Hack the vending machines.  Leave no trace, get yourself something to eat and drink.  Do this, then I will believe your claim."

[[Continue|cont2n]]

title: cautious2
body:
Secret Squirrel: "You wouldn’t have got me involved if you didn’t think you could do it. Just concentrate and you will be fine."

[[Continue|cont2n]]
